full_summary:
# Fixed Wing Aircraft Services

### Tender Information

* **Contract Reference Number**: #cb-87-40530437
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: #W8485-237191
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-07
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-22T17:00:00 (Expired)
* **Contract Description**: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires services for a commercial fixed wing aircraft to provide air drop test and associated services at the Canadian Forces Maritime and Test Ranges (CFMETR) in Nanoose Bay, British Columbia (BC).

### Contract Requirements

The requirement includes the charter services of a commercial fixed wing aircraft, as well as Additional Work Requirements (AWR) associated with maintaining Government Furnished Equipment (GFE). Services are needed to support activities at the CFCMETR.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Donnalee Roman
	+ Email: [Donnalee.Roman@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Donnalee.Roman@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 548-0060

### Access to Tender Documents

Please visit the following links to access the documentation:

* **English Language Documents**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27021/eng-rfp.pdf
* **French Language Documents**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27021/fr-rfp.pdf

### Contract Categories and Trade Agreements

* **Contract Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

Note that the above rephrased document is in English. If you need the French version, I can provide that as well. Here is a brief excerpt from the original document:
